title: Screening of psoriatic arthritis by dermatologists–a German nationwide survey
details: A Pinter, M Hofmann, R Kaufmann, J Müller‐Stahl… - JDDG: Journal der …, 2024
abstract: Summary Background and Objectives Up to 30% of psoriasis (PsO) is clinically associated with psoriatic arthritis (PsA). A large proportion of new onset of PsA is diagnosed at a later stage, despite the necessity of early effective treatment to …
